conbody.p: As much as possible, RESTful applications should avoid storing state about an interaction with a client. However, it is sometimes unavoidable. Features like shopping carts are the classic example, but other more mundane interactions like proper login handling can be greatly enhanced by proper usage of sessions.
This chapter will describe how Yesod stores session data, how you can access this data, and some special functions to help you make the most of sessions.
